## The Best FREE Data Analytics Courses (2025)

### **1. Google Data Analytics Certificate (Coursera)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/professional-certificates/google-data-analytics)
- **Duration:** 6 months (10 hrs/week)
- **Cost:** FREE to audit (certificate $39/month)
- **What You Learn:** Excel, SQL, R, Tableau, data cleaning
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best comprehensive beginner course

### **2. IBM Data Analyst Professional Certificate (Coursera)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/professional-certificates/ibm-data-analyst)
- **Duration:** 3-4 months
- **What You Learn:** Python, SQL, data viz, Excel, dashboards
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Great for Python focus

### **3. CS50's Introduction to Programming with Python (Harvard)**
- **Link:** [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/cs50s-introduction-to-programming-with-python)
- **Cost:** 100% FREE (certificate optional $149)
- **What You Learn:** Python fundamentals
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best Python course

### **4. Kaggle Learn**
- **Link:** [Kaggle Learn](https://www.kaggle.com/learn)
- **Duration:** 2-4 hours per course
- **Topics:** Python, pandas, ML, SQL, data viz
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best for hands-on practice

### **5. freeCodeCamp Data Analysis with Python**
- **Link:** [freeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.org/learn/data-analysis-with-python/)
- **Duration:** 300 hours
- **What You Learn:** NumPy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Completely free certification

### **6. Khan Academy Statistics & Probability**
- **Link:** [Khan Academy](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/statistics-probability)
- **Duration:** Self-paced
- **What You Learn:** All statistics fundamentals
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best free statistics course

### **7. Microsoft Power BI Training**
- **Link:** [Microsoft Learn](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/powerplatform/power-bi)
- **Duration:** 20+ hours
- **What You Learn:** Power BI from basics to advanced
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Official and comprehensive

### **8. Tableau Training Videos**
- **Link:** [Tableau](https://www.tableau.com/learn/training)
- **Duration:** Various lengths
- **What You Learn:** Tableau Desktop & Prep
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best for Tableau

### **9. SQL for Data Science (Coursera - UC Davis)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/sql-for-data-science)
- **Duration:** 4 weeks
- **Cost:** FREE to audit
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Good SQL foundation

### **10. R Programming (Johns Hopkins - Coursera)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/r-programming)
- **Duration:** 4 weeks
- **Cost:** FREE to audit
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best R fundamentals

### **11. DataCamp Introduction Courses**
- **Link:** [DataCamp](https://www.datacamp.com/)
- **Duration:** First chapter of each course FREE
- **Topics:** Python, R, SQL, Excel
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐ Good for trying before buying

### **12. Excel Skills for Business (Coursera - Macquarie)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/excel)
- **Duration:** 6 months
- **Cost:** FREE to audit
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Comprehensive Excel

### **13. Data Science Math Skills (Duke - Coursera)**
- **Link:** [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/datasciencemathskills)
- **Duration:** 4 weeks
- **What You Learn:** Essential math for data science
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Math refresher

### **14. LinkedIn Learning (Free Trial)**
- **Link:** [LinkedIn Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/)
- **Duration:** 1 month free
- **Topics:** Everything data analytics
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐ Good breadth, cancel before charge

### **15. YouTube Playlists (Curated)**
- **StatQuest:** Statistics explained simply
- **Corey Schafer:** Python tutorials
- **Alex the Analyst:** Data analyst career
- **Ken Jee:** Data science projects
- **Worth It?** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Best free supplemental content

## Learning Path

**Months 1-2:** Foundation
1. Khan Academy (Statistics)
2. CS50 Python OR Kaggle Learn Python
3. SQL for Data Science

**Months 3-4:** Tools
4. Excel Skills for Business
5. Tableau OR Power BI training
6. Kaggle Learn (Pandas, Data Viz)

**Months 5-6:** Applied Learning
7. Google Data Analytics Certificate
8. freeCodeCamp Projects
9. Kaggle Competitions

---

## How to "Audit" Coursera Courses for Free

1. Enroll in course
2. Click "Audit" instead of "Start Free Trial"
3. Access all videos and readings FREE
4. Can't submit assignments or get certificate
5. Good enough for learning!

---

## Comparison: FREE vs PAID

**What Free Courses CAN'T Give You:**
- Official certificates (sometimes)
- Assignment feedback
- Live instruction
- Career services
- Networking

**What Free Courses CAN Give You:**
- Same core content
- Knowledge and skills
- Portfolio projects
- Community support

**My Take:** Free courses are 90% as good. Save money.
